channel.title: Making my client 600+ Graphics and anims
channel.description:
[size=10pt][i][color=purple]Title says it all[/i][/size]
[center]How do I make my PI client animations 600+? Tutorial or anything will help alot thanks..

item.title: Making my client 600+ Graphics and anims
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

Javerfire:

there are several things you will need for this, 1 a client programer (or yourself) with expertise in cache editing. Then you will need to ensure you have the correct coding in your client BEFORE adding any models or maps. Then you will need to edit the cache to contain the models, and finally add in the maps manually. Either that or you could just use a 600 base and client in which it is easy to create a webclient. If you need ANY help i can direct you to tutorials and such that will help.

Yep, I need a tutorial.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my client 600+ Graphics and anims
